scripts.db:migrate: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- supabase db push --workdir infra/supabase
scripts.db:reset: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- supabase db reset --workdir infra/supabase
scripts.db:test: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'for test in infra/supabase/tests/*.sql; do echo "Running $test..."; psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -f "$test" || exit 1; done; echo "\nâœ“ All database tests passed!"'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist .turbo
